The Gaoping Zhongcun Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Zhongcun village, Qinxian County, Jincheng City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Qinhe Energy Group Zhongcun Coal Industry Company

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Qinhe Energy Group and has undergone mergers and restructuring.
